text: 5:5-6 Rom 8:24-25; 1 Korin 7:19; Galesia 6:15; Kolosi 3:11; 2 Timoti 4:8; Jems 2:18-22Egh gumazim Krais Iesus ko ikɨtɨ, gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorir arazim, a pura bizim, egh gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar aghorir puvatɨzir arazim, a uaghan pura bizim. Ezɨma gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim itim, an nɨghnɨzir gavgavim a gamima, a bar gumazir igharazibagh ifonge, kar guizbangɨn bizim. Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavimɨn, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Egha e, dughiar God suam, ia nan damazimɨn derazim, mɨzuai.
